example.text: We know that this extreme tragic, horrific killing was not an isolated incident. Mr. Speaker, I rise today to honor D'Angelia McMillan, Arielle Betts, Amina Garth and Heavenly Garth for their commitment to creating change in Kentucky. As members of the Real Young Prodigy's Program, they spearheaded an advocacy campaign to pass the CROWN Act in Louisville.
